name: RealEstateHelper
0:
”Alexa, open Real Estate Helper”
”Alexa, start Real Estate Helper”
”Alexa, launch Real Estate Helper”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real estate helper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our platform allows real estate agents to stand above the rest. By using voice technology, agents are able to showcase properties to millions of Amazon Alexa users. Whether it's used with an ad or at an open house, Real Estate Helper will leave all users with a memorable experience.

Allow Real Estate Helper to assist you in marketing your properties to the millions of monthly users of Alexa. Amazon Alexa resides on millions of devices worldwide.

Using Real Estate Helper is simple. Real estate agents can create a listing on our platform, providing full details about their property. Once complete, agents can provide sellers with information about Real Estate Helper. Our voice assistant will answer questions in a conversational format, repeating information provided by the real estate agent. 

Allow our platform to lead your buyers on a guided tour of your properties. Agents can place Amazon Alexa devices inside a property during an Open House. Buyers can ask Real Estate Helper questions about the property and surrounding area in a two-way conversation.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
